name: Buggy Rush
description:
Get 1st place!
An obstacle buggy racing game "Buggy Rush"

▼ EASY TO PLAY

◆ Drive the Buggy
Compete in this anything-can-happen Buggy Race.
Take out the competition and aim for the top!

◆ Fly the Kite
Use the kite to fly.
Take shortcuts and make the competition eat your dust!
